availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Orlando V Talbott (Bourbon County Horse Stable)

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a stable keeper in Bourbon County. Owned three slaves in 1860.

bibl.p: U.S. Civil War Draft Registration Records, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Seventh District, volume 2, page 13.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Bourbon, Paris, page 25.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris, page 4.
